problems.title: Maximum Number of Vowels in a Substring of Given Length (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given a string s and an integer k, return the maximum number of vowel letters in any substring of s with length k.
Vowel letters in English are 'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', and 'u'.

Input Format:
First line: string s.
Second line: integer k.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the maximum number of vowels.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
abciiidef
3

Sample Output
3

Explanation: "iii" contains 3 vowel letters.
hintsList: Use a fixed-size sliding window of length k.
Count vowels in the first window, then slide one by one updating the count.
